1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Encode using mix text.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text.MixEncode
6  ( -- * Encode
7    MixEncode (..),
8    MixShortEncode (..),
9    mixIdEncode,
10    Shorten, noShorten,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text.MixText    as B
14
15-- | Encode via mix text.
16class MixEncode a where
17    mixEncode :: a -> B.MixText
18
19-- | @(+)@ or @(-)@.
20instance MixEncode Bool where
21    mixEncode True  = B.mixString "(+)"
22    mixEncode False = B.mixString "(-)"
23
24-- | Encode with shortener.
25class MixShortEncode a where
26    mixShortEncode :: Shorten -> a -> B.MixText
27
28-- | 'mixShortEncode' with no shortener.
29mixIdEncode :: (MixShortEncode a) => a -> B.MixText
30mixIdEncode = mixShortEncode noShorten
31
32-- | Convert string to short sign.
33type Shorten = String -> Maybe String
34
35-- | Shorten which does not shorten strings.
36noShorten :: Shorten
37noShorten _ = Nothing
38
